CN：一张徐徐展开的中国传统卷轴，对角线构图，展开后展现出精美的纸雕艺术，纸雕作品以中国山水为主题，展现出山川河流、亭台楼阁的景象，卷轴上印有中国书法，灯光从卷轴中透出，照亮了纸雕作品，营造出一种神秘而梦幻的氛围，卷轴的材质是宣纸，纸雕作品的材质是纸张，灯光是暖色调，整体风格古典优雅，充满中国传统文化韵味。
EN：A slowly unfolding traditional Chinese scroll with a diagonal composition reveals exquisite paper-cut art when unfolded. The paper-cut work is based on the theme of Chinese landscape, showing scenes of mountains, rivers, pavilions and towers. Chinese calligraphy is printed on the scroll. The light shines through the scroll, illuminating the paper-cut work and creating a mysterious and dreamy atmosphere. The scroll is made of rice paper, and the paper-cut work is made of paper. The light is warm in color, and the overall style is classical and elegant, full of the charm of traditional Chinese culture. --q 1 --s 100 --ar 3:4 --v 6.0 
作者：@Ai数字绘画馆，WeChat：WoDaaaaaaaa

CN：一张在桌子上逐步展开的中国传统卷轴，有未展开的卷筒和已经展开的画卷，对角线构图，展开后展现出精美的纸雕艺术，纸雕作品以中国山水为主题，展现出山川河流、亭台楼阁的景象，卷轴上印有中国书法，灯光从卷轴中透出，照亮了纸雕作品，营造出一种神秘而梦幻的氛围，卷轴的材质是宣纸，纸雕作品的材质是纸张，灯光是暖色调，整体风格古典优雅，充满中国传统文化韵味。
EN：A traditional Chinese scroll gradually unfolds on the table. There are unrolled rolls and unfolded scrolls, with a diagonal composition. After unfolding, it shows exquisite paper sculpture art. The paper sculpture work is based on the theme of Chinese landscape, showing the scenes of mountains, rivers, pavilions and towers. Chinese calligraphy is printed on the scroll. The light shines through the scroll, illuminating the paper sculpture work, creating a mysterious and dreamy atmosphere. The material of the scroll is rice paper, and the material of the paper sculpture work is paper. The light is warm in color. The overall style is classical and elegant, full of the charm of Chinese traditional culture. --q 1 --s 100 --ar 3:2 --v 6.0 --personalize m8yndtt 
作者：@Ai数字绘画馆，WeChat：WoDaaaaaaaa
